name: getIssueTypeProperty
description:
Returns the key and value of the [issue type property](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/platform/storing-data-without-a-database/#a-id-jira-entity-properties-a-jira-entity-properties).

This operation can be accessed anonymously.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:**

 *  *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg) to get the details of any issue type.
 *  *Browse projects* [project permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/yodKLg) to get the details of any issue types associated with the projects the user has permission to browse.

issueTypeId.description: The ID of the issue type.

propertyKey.description: The key of the property. Use [Get issue type property keys](#api-rest-api-3-issuetype-issueTypeId-properties-get) to get a list of all issue type property keys.

$block: An entity property, for more information see [Entity properties](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/platform/jira-entity-properties/).

$ul: **key**: The key of the property. Required on create and update.
**value**: The value of the property. Required on create and update.
